Header.heading: Loan Verification Portal
Header.description: Effortlessly verify credentials with Omera Bank Verify Portal! Just scan the QR code or upload it for instant validation, following the steps below.

loan_page.success_message: You have successfully logged into Omera Bank using eSignet
loan_page.subtext: Get quick and easy loans in just a few steps
loan_page.apply_loan: Click on 'Apply For Loan' to move forward

loan_result.background_process: Your application has been verified and approved!

form.details_description: Ut faucibus est ut amet at mattis proin. A nec lacinia faucibus tincidunt adipiscing.
form.avail_loan_before: Have you availed a loan before?
form.terms&conditions: I hereby declare that all the information provided is true and accurate. I consent to background verification based on my tax profile.

camera_access.camera_access_denied_description: We need your camera to scan the code. Go to your browser settings and allow camera access for this website.

stepper.upload_qr_code_description: Upload a file that contains a QR code
stepper.verify_document_description: Verification for the document or card is in progress.
stepper.scan_qr_code_description: Click 'Scan' to start scanning the document or card with a QR code
stepper.activate_camera: Activate Camera and Position QR Code
stepper.activate_camera_description: Activate your device camera and hold the QR code within the frame to initiate verification.
stepper.verify_process_description: The QR code verification is in progress.

modal.background_process: Your TAN details have been successfully verified, and your credit score is Excellent!
